data.price: When there comes Allah’s help and the conquest[1],
and you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes,
data.arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

data.price: then glorify the praise of your Lord, and ask His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
data.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
